reviewText: Very well done documentary of the life and times of Thomas Merton.  There were situations that could have been given more attention; but I was well satisfied

I been reading Thomas Merton for more than 15years, his teachings have made an important impact in my life. I have never stopped learning from his books. When you watch this biography you will find a real human being with his achievements and failures. This is a very important film that will enrich your knowledge of this important 20 century philosofer.
Life ain't simple. It is complicated...even for Trappist monks.
Soul Searching:The Journey of Thomas Merton is a deep, moving and wonderful film on Merton's life and his humaness.

This film on Merton is disappointing. They left out so much that was important, despite the fact that they had the courage to mention Merton's affair with Margie. You're better off getting the much older video "Merton -- A Film Biography," which, although it doesn't mention the affair, gives a much more thorough overview of Merton's writings and life.
